availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert J. Allen (Owensboro, Kentucky, farmer and 2nd lieut 17th KY Inf (U.S.A.))

body.p: Owensboro, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Isham R. Allen and Lucinda Allen. Farmer in Owensboro in 1850. Served in the 17th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as quartermaster sergeant, fifth sergeant, and second lieutenant from February 3, 1862, to October 16, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, Owensboro, p. 350B.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 948-49.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 298.
